title: More Businesses Support Hybrid Work (Podcast)
itunes:title: More Businesses Support Hybrid Work (Podcast)
description:
WeWork Chief Operating Officer Shyam Gidumal discusses the results of the company's return to work survey showing employers and workers agree on splitting time between home and the office.

Host: Carol Massar. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
WeWork Chief Operating Officer Shyam Gidumal discusses the results of the company's return to work survey showing employers and workers agree on splitting time between home and the office.
